name: Cutest Crochet Baby & Toddler Bow Slippers
description:
These adorable little slippers are perfect for any little girl.

Cooler weather is on it's way and these adorable little slippers are comfy and cozy. They make a perfect shower or just because gift.

These slippers are available in the following sizes at this time:
0-3mo
3-6mo
6-12mo
Toddler-please let me know what size

All slippers sized over 6 months come with a non-slip sole at no additional charge.

Each pair is made to order. Currently I am only offering these slippers in the colors shown. More color options will be added as I have time to make and photograph them.

***If you would like custom colors, please email me at sheepishhooker@gmail.com and we can work out the details.***

name: Baby Cowboy or Cowgirl Set-Includes Hat & Boots
description:
Yee Haw!! Your little one will look so cute in this hat and boots! Wonderful for everyday use, but also makes a great photo prop.

**** Due to popularity of this item there is a 1 week turnaround****

Please read the note below for checking order status. You may also want to preview the list before placing your order to see how many orders would need to be made ahead of yours.

Please specify sizing and colors. If no size/colors are selected then your item will be made brown/khaki in 0-3mo sizing.

Both items in this listing are available in the following sizes:
0-3mo (also fits American Girl dolls!)
3-6mo

Please see this listing for larger sizing: https://www.etsy.com/listing/119199019/baby-cowboy-or-cowgirl-set-includes-hat

Add on a diaper cover here:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/126542696/crochet-diaper-cover-made-to-order?

Each item in my shop is made to order unless it is specified otherwise. You will be provided with a delivery confirmation number upon shipment.

I've tried to include a variety of pictures to give you an idea of your options. Heart shape buttons are an option for cowgirl sets, please let me know if you want them. Otherwise it will have stars. If you would like the "braid" in a different color, please also specify in the notes, otherwise it will be made in the same color as the entire hat.


*~*~*YOU CAN CHECK THE STATUS OF YOUR ORDER ON MY ORDER LIST HERE*~*~*
https://www.facebook.com/notes/the-sheepish-hooker/order-list/339085892830167

Special thanks goes out to the mom of this adorable babe for allowing me to use his photo & Kimberly G Photography for such an amazing shot.
